game.name: Car World
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Car World is a realistic 2D driving and life simulator focused on true car ownership and maintenance. Drive, repair, and tune your vehicles, take jobs or trade them for profit. Every car system is simulated down to the smallest detail. Can you prove yourself as a true car enthusiast?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Car World is a realistic 2D driving and life simulator focused on true car ownership and maintenance. Drive, repair, and tune your vehicles, take jobs or trade them for profit. Every car system is simulated down to the smallest detail. Can you prove yourself as a true car enthusiast?
